name: Rogue'narok
description:
Grab Mjölnir and play as Thor in this Roguelite game inspired by Norse mythology!

Travel to Helheim and take on Hel herself to stop her from starting Ragnarok!

Controls:

W A S D to move

Mouse and Left Click to aim and attack

E to interact with powerups

(Maybe turn the sound down a bit, it might be loud)

----

Made by:

Herrelaekker - Programming
